review_blob: Very drinkable lager. Always available, good pricing, far better than any American lager (and many other US beers), and a better choice over Bavaria, Hollandia or Heineken. A good drink for the lads... Not out of this world, but more than decent.
Tastes like carbonated water with a pale lager flavour. Not my first, second or any choice. Avoid it unless extremely necessary. The Mayas piss nicer liquids.
